main.name: Niclas Deplazes
main.description: currently studying for my Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
main.bio: My name is Niclas. I love coding because with just a few lines of code I can turn my ideas into reality, which potentially can impact the world and shape the future.
main.bio2: I learned the basics of programming in Java at an IT-College which consisted of 3 years of school and a 1 year apprenticeship. After completing the mandatory military recruit school, I did another 1 year apprenticeship at a startup which builds an AI solution to analyze MRI images.
main.bio3: I'm currently studying at the ZHAW School Of Engineering in Winterthur for my Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

education.description: 3 years in school & 1 year apprenticeship at Liip AG

work.title: Junior AI Engineer
work.description: Involved in a project called ScanDiags, which is a AI powered software solution for the interpretation and analysis of MRI scans. Mainly worked with T-SQL on the SQL Server Database and with Python to implement the service which creates PDF reports from the AI analysis.

work.title: Junior Web Developer
work.description: Involved in a project called Memberplus, which is a web platform of Raiffeisen, that promotes various discounts for their customers. Worked both on the Frontend (Angular) and Backend (PHP).

projects.title: ScanDiags
projects.category: AI powered software solution for the interpretation and analysis of MRI scans

projects.title: Memberplus
projects.category: Web platform of Raiffeisen Bank to promote discounts for their customers
